name: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Shadow of Death
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Shadow of Death
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Shadow of Death is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 31-03-2000. The 3DO Company published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Heroes of Might and Magic 3: The Shadow of Death on PC.
It was scored by Paul Romero.
